Voice Commands
NameCommandDescription
Banking:.bank .withdraw .depositAllow's you to change Adena in to GoldBar and Oposite.
Password:.changepasswordAllow's you to change your password.
Debug:.debugAllows you to change Debuging method ON/OFF.
Hellbound:.hellbound .openatod.hellbound see status. Usage: .openatod [number] opens Acient tomp of deamons
Language:.langAllows you to change Language (Only En and Ru).
Repair:.repairAllows you to Repair a broken Character on the same Account.
Stats:.statsUsage: .stats [player name] See stats about Events on this character.
Trade:.tradeon .tradeoffAllows you to Disline or Accept trade's.
TvTVoiced:.tvt .tvtjoin .tvtleaveAllows you to see the status or join/leave TvTevent!.
Castle:.castleAllow Clan leaders to register a siege in a castle.
Wedding:.engage .gotolove .divorceAllows you to marie/divorce or go to your partner. Usage: .engage/.divorce [Target]
Menu:.menuAllows you to open a simple menu with all of the above.

Safe: %safe_max_full% Max: %Enchant_Max%

Subs: %Max_Subs%
